result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Battery or Threat to Judge, Prosecutor, or Law Enforcement Officer

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Thomas N Potter

defendant.name: Potter, Thomas N
defendant.address: 710 Miner Ave W.  Apt 321, Ladysmith, WI 54848

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on November 8, 2022 at 10:30 am.

1:29 PM Defendant Thomas N Potter in court.  Attorney Laurie Sazama Osberg in court for Thomas N Potter.  Attorney Emily Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin.  Heard along with 22CF162, 22CF172.  Waive formal reading of the CC.

22CF172- $1000.00 sign bond, Defendant is not to consume or possess alcohol.  Do not enter premises where alcohol is primary business, any bars taverns or liquor stores or any other establishment where the primary purpose is the sale of alcohol. No possession/consumption or use of illegal or illicit drugs, or any substance intended to use to alter mental state or mood.  Not to possess any drug paraphernalia.  No possession of medications not prescribed to you by a physician. 

DE/Atty will waive TL for PH.  Court instructs on waiver of TL, DE understands waiver of TL, court will accept waiver.  Settlement conference 10/13/22 @ 1:15pm.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on November 1, 2022 at 09:00 am.

1:07 PM Defendant Thomas N Potter in court.  Attorney Emily Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin.   Matter set for a hearing.  1:24 PM Case recalled.  Attorney Laurie Osberg appeared with the DE CC filed just prior to this hearing. .  Bond continues.  Adj. INIT set for 9/27/22 at 1:00 PM.  Adj. 1:27 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 27, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 27, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

1:28 PM Defendant Thomas N Potter appeared by video from RC Jail with Atty Laurie Osberg.   Attorney Emily Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin.  State argues bond, asks for a $500.00 cash bond, absolute sobriety, no operation of a MV without a valid DL.  Atty Osberg argues for a sign bond, no objection to the conditions State requested.  

Court will order a $1500.00 sign bond, DE will report to the RC Jail every Saturday between the hours of 8:00am and 6:00PM . Set for Init App September 6, 2022 @ 1:00PM. Adj 1:33pm.
Absolute sobriety, no operation of a MV without a valid DL. DE will report to the RC Jail every Saturday between the hours of 8:00 am and 6:00 pm.
